text: The Magic Weaver () is a 1960 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.Чудо-богатыри: секреты и умения русского солдатаМАРЬЯ-ИСКУСНИЦА It stars Mikhail Kuznetsov, Ninel Myshkova, and Viktor Perevalov. ==Actors== * Mikhail Kuznetsov - Old soldier * Ninel Myshkova - Maria the weaver * Viktor Perevalov - Ivanushka * Anatoly Kubatsky - Water Spirit * Olga Khachapuridze - Alyonoushka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 movies Category:1960s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: The Magic Weaver
